item.title: Sudan condemns RSF chief’s visit to Uganda as minimising ‘human values’
item.content:encoded: Uganda Ministry of Foreign Affairs says Mohamed Dagalo's meeting with President Yoweri Museveni focused on ending war.

item.title: Man killed after entering perimeter of Trump’s Mar-a-Lago resort
item.content:encoded: The incident in Florida took place on Sunday when US President Donald Trump was in Washington, DC.

item.title: France to summon US ambassador over comments on far-right activist’s death
item.content:encoded: Top French diplomat says his government rejects any attempt to use Quentin Deranque's death 'for political purposes'.

item.title: Video: Hundreds of far-right anti-Islam protesters march in Manchester
item.content:encoded: Hundreds of far-right anti-Islam marched through Manchester on Saturday, demanding mass deportations of migrants.

item.title: Iran-US tensions: What would blocking Strait of Hormuz mean for oil, LNG?
item.content:encoded: More than $500bn in oil and gas flows through waterway annually, leaving the global economy exposed to disruptions.

item.title: LIVE: Tottenham Hotspur vs Arsenal – Premier League
item.content:encoded: Follow the build-up, analysis and live text commentary of the game as Spurs host Arsenal for crucial North London derby.

item.title: Trump tariff chaos: What does 15% levy mean for trade deals the US signed?
item.content:encoded: From the EU to Vietnam to the UK and India, multiple countries had signed or finalised trade deals with the US.

item.title: England bowlers crush Sri Lanka in T20 World Cup Super Eight opener
item.content:encoded: The 2022 champions demolish host nation Sri Lanka for just 95 runs to win in Pallekele.

item.title: Small but mighty: Colombia’s Muslim community celebrates Ramadan
item.content:encoded: Colombia's Muslims comprise less than 0.2 percent of the population in a country that is majority Catholic.

item.title: Attackers kill dozens, abduct women and children in Nigeria
item.content:encoded: Dozens are reported to have been killed and women and children abducted after armed men attacked a village in Nigeria.

item.title: Palestine Action activists reunited with family after granted bail
item.content:encoded: 12 Palestine Action activists, including hunger strikers, reunited with their families after they were granted bail.

item.title: How four years of Ukraine war have changed Russia
item.content:encoded: From curbs on rights to fewer choices at the market, the war has taken its toll. Still, support for it remains high.

item.title: UEFA and FIFA may get a red card at the ICC for ignoring Israeli violations
item.content:encoded: A landmark referral of UEFA and FIFA leaders to the International Criminal Court could set an important legal precedent.

item.title: Rafael Grossi on nuclear risk and reforming the UN
item.content:encoded: The IAEA chief discusses rising nuclear tensions, UN reform and whether the system can still prevent war.

item.title: At least one killed in widescale Russian attacks on Ukraine’s energy sector
item.content:encoded: Main target was the energy sector, but residential buildings and a railway were also damaged, President Zelenskyy says.

item.title: Somaliland minister says US may access its minerals, military bases: Report
item.content:encoded: Minister of the presidency says exclusive rights offered to US are part of Somaliland's push for global recognition.

item.title: LIVE: India vs South Africa – T20 World Cup
item.content:encoded: Follow our live score and full text and photo stream from today's Super Eight match between India and South Africa.

item.title: Elderly men beaten up ‘for being Muslim’ in India
item.content:encoded: Three elderly men were slapped and chased by a passerby in India after he reportedly targeted them for being Muslim.

item.title: The aftermath of Pakistan’s air strikes in Afghanistan
item.content:encoded: Attacks kill civilians, deepen border dispute and prompt threat of retaliation from Kabul.

item.title: Ryan Garcia defeats Mario Barrios to win WBC welterweight title
item.content:encoded: Garcia is the new world champion after a unanimous points decision victory against title holder.

item.title: Pakistan ‘kills dozens’ in air strikes on Afghanistan
item.content:encoded: Pakistan’s military has carried out air strikes in Afghanistan, targeting what it called 'camps and hideouts'.

item.title: Sean Strickland ends Anthony Hernandez’s win streak with TKO victory
item.content:encoded: The third-ranked Strickland hands Hernandez his first UFC defeat in more than five years.

item.title: Video: Deadly ‘terrorist attack’ in Ukraine’s Lviv
item.content:encoded: Two explosions occurred while Ukrainian police responded to an emergency at a store in the city of Lviv.

item.title: DHS agent killed US citizen in March last year, records reveal
item.content:encoded: Texas shooting appears to be ​the first known instance of US citizen being killed during Trump's immigration crackdown.

item.title: Lionel Messi, Inter Miami routed by LAFC in MLS season opener
item.content:encoded: The Inter Miami star began his club's MLS Cup title defence with a crushing away loss to rivals Los Angeles FC.
